node.title: Oral Health and Overall Health
node.label: 19. May 2020
node.introduction: How much do you know? Maybe you haven't given it much thought, after all who thinks that joint pain, confusion or heart health is related to their mouth. Surprisingly it is!

node.title: Dogs and Gut Health
node.label: 15. May 2020
node.introduction: If you have a dog, ask yourself this question. Why did you make the decision to get him or her?

node.alt: Photo of a puppy.  We all love a puppy.

node.title: Coconut, Cacao Chia Pots
node.introduction: These creamy pots of yumminess are packed full of fibre and heart health omega 3 fats. They also happen to be vegan, gluten and dairy free! Enjoy at breakfast or anytime of the day!

node.title: Tahini, Date & Cacao Cookies
node.introduction: Nothing beats a cuppa and a bit of homemaking! These cookies are super delicious and a good source of protein, fibre and energy giving B vitamins.

node.text:
HOW MUCH FIBRE DO YOU EAT IN A DAY? 
Chia seeds are an excellent way to get fibre into your diet. Try this Coconut, Cacao Chia pot (recipe on website link in bio). Most of us eat around 1/2 of the recommended 30g daily intake! ü§î
This is not good news! We know that fibre is a key player in microbiome health, so the more you can eat the better!
Some types of fibre ferment in our large intestine which helps beneficial gut bacteria AKA the good guys to flourish üòé
While other types bulk out our stools and keep us regular üí©
Either way its all good >>>Fibre rich foods include whole grains like brown rice and oats, beans, lentils, chia seeds, vegetables, fruits, nuts and seeds. 
Fibre lowdown >>> Try to include some of these to meet your daily target.
‚ñ™Ô∏è1/2 an avocado = 6.5g ‚ñ™Ô∏è1 Pear (medium) with skin = 6g ‚ñ™Ô∏è1 tbsp chia seeds = 5.5g
‚ñ™Ô∏è1 medium potato =  5g ‚ñ™Ô∏è1 portion (80g) peas = 4g
‚ñ™Ô∏è30g of oats = 3g

The main thing to remember is that all types of fibre are key to maintaining good health.
Focus on gradually building up to and beyond the recommended daily intake, making sure you are drinking plenty of water too. Happy gut bugs = happy you!

#gutfood #happyguthappyyou #eatmorefibre #eatmoreplants #plantpower #feedthemicrobiome #healthyfood #wholefoodie #sugarfreerecipes  #eatyourcolors #easyhealthymeals #yummyvegan #wholefoodsplantbased #justeatrealfood  #gutfood #glutenfreegutfoods #glutenfreegut #glutenfreeliving #glutenfreeguthealth #bloodsugarbalance #personalisednutrition #chiaburst #energy #goodfood #rebalancingyou #energise #restore #nourish

Today's lunch was delicious! Left over chilli piled on to roasted aubergine, topped with fresh coriander, cherry toms, jalapenos and a little coconut yogurt!  So good! What are your favourite ways to use up left over chilli?üçÜüòéüå∂Ô∏è
#leftoversforlunch #aubergineemoji #eatmorefibre #eatmoreplants #plantpower #feedthemicrobiome #healthyfood #energise #restore #nourish #rebalancingyou #roastedaubergine

Happy Monday everyone! Just having two of my favourite things!!! Sweet rhubarb tea thank you @taylors and pistachios! Pistachios are a good source of fibre, B vitamins and antioxidants. They can also help to balance blood sugar, boost immunity,  reduce inflammation and are great for skin health! Plus they come in cute little shells. Win win!! üòé
#gutfood #happyguthappyyou #fibre #eatmorefibre #eatmoreplants #plantpower #feedthemicrobiome #healthyfood #bloodsugarbalance #personalisednutrition  #energise #restore #nourish #rebalancingyou #pistachiosrule #skinhealth

metadata.siteDescription: ENERGISE, RESTORE, NOURISH. I'm studying with the renowned Institute for Optimum Nutrition and will qualify next year. Until then, this is a place to inspire and share healthful information, tips, tricks and recipes. I hope to energise, restore and nourish your body mind and soul!
